entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
